post: Summer's not over yet! Book your end of summer travel today! BRI has partnered with TravelingToGive, a smart trip-planning tool that gives back to teachers and students. By using our travel booking tool, you can make a direct impact on civic education. Visit the link and plan your trip now. Every trip you take gives back to BRI!  https://lnkd.in/eNRSQW2C.  #BillofRightsInstitute  #BRI  #Travel

We would like to thank Salem One for their generous donation to the Bill of Rights Institute. Salem One, Inc. provides printing services. The Company offers direct mail and marketing, packaging, commercial printing, and fulfillment and inventory management. We are grateful for Salem One's donation of 15,000 pocket constitutions to teachers and students in North and South Carolina. To learn more about Salem One, visit  https://salem-one.com/ To learn how you can support Power of the Printed Word, visit  https://lnkd.in/eE-zWeup  #BillofRightsInstitute  #BRI  #PowerofthePrintedWord

The Bill of Rights Institute has been supporting educators and students for 25 yearsand well have plenty of exciting news to share this year! A great way to stay up-to-date on all things BRI is to subscribe to our Development Department newsletter! Well bring you the latest news and information on how you can support our mission. You can join right here:  https://lnkd.in/ghYSQ2Cn  #billofrightsinstitute  #BRI  #newsletter

The Bill of Rights Institute is committed to ensuring teachers and students have the resources and support they need as they head back to the classroom this school year. Here's what one teacher from Texas has to say about our resources: "Thank you for supporting teachers in our quest to make history come alive in our classroom. I am so grateful not only to have been introduced to the Bill of Rights Institute but to have so many resources to take back to use... Because of your assistance, many teachers will be returning school with ideas and resources that will inspire their students. Thank you!" To see how you can help us support teachers and students, visit  https://lnkd.in/ePsJtSJy  #billofrightsinstitute  #BRI  #civicseducation

Make a difference today by supporting Power of the Printed Word! The Power of the Printed Word is a funding and printing initiative to enable BRI to provide pocket copies of the U. S. Constitution to teachers and students nationwide. Our pocket constitutions are valuable teaching tools that give students access to primary sources, including the Declaration of Independence, the Constitution, and the Bill of Rights. Our pocket constitutions are in high demand among history, government and civics teachers. Learn more at  https://lnkd.in/eeKJPSd5  #BillofRightsInstitute  #BRI  #PowerofthePrintedWord

Welcome to the team, Dr. Petri! Veteran social studies educator, Scott Petri joined BRI to help civics and history teachers integrate reading, writing, listening, and speaking instruction into their classroom practices. As BRIs Manager, Program Partnerships, Petri will bolster the Institutes efforts to support teachers nationwide with high-quality professional learning. Read more here  https://lnkd.in/ebQMtGVM  #billofrightsinstitute  #BRI  #welcometotheteam

We would like to thank Periodic Presidents for their generous donation to the Bill of Rights Institute. Periodic Presidents provides visually engaging infographics and educational resources about U. S. presidents and government. These materials help simplify complex historical and civic concepts, making them accessible and interesting for students of all abilities, thereby enhancing their understanding and participation in civic education. To learn more about Periodic Presidents, visit  https://lnkd.in/ez4CMwjX To see how you can support civic education, visit  https://lnkd.in/ePsJtSJy  #billofrightsinstitute  #BRI  #civiceducation

Do you have a will? Despite the importance of having a will (or trust), many Americans never get around to drafting one. Or their will was drawn up many years ago and has not been looked at since. Now may be the right time to review or create your will, during Make-a-Will Month. A well-thought-out will plan helps minimize conflicts, maximizes a positive impact on family and others, and can give you peace of mind. If you would like to learn more about getting started on creating your will or updating your current estate plans, we would be happy to make available to you our easy-to-follow Estate Planning Guide. Just visit  https://lnkd.in/ehPuv2vW  #BillofRightsInstitute  #BRI  #MakeaWillMonth

The Bill of Rights Insitute is proud to be supported by Liberty Tutors. Liberty Tutors offers a wide range of Social Studies tutoring and enrichment classes that cater to diverse needs and interests. Here's what founder and teacher Donna Vitek says about BRI: "As a teacher, I have found the Bill of Rights Institute to be an invaluable resource when teaching Civics, US History, and Constitutional Law. I have found the primary source documents that provide annotations to be very useful for students with learning disabilities. It equalizes the playing field within a classroom for interpreting the information contained in primary source documents. I have seen, first-hand, the confidence in my students abilities increase drastically due to their ability to debate with their peers. Thank you, Bill of Rights Institute!" To learn more about Liberty Tutors, visit  https://libertytutors.net/  #BillofRightsInstitute  #BRI  #testimonial

From t-shirts to tumblers, show your support for BRI by checking out our store. You can find classroom resources, apparel and accessories, and even our popular collectible stickers! Browse our store here  https://lnkd.in/euFBBmF8  #BillofRightsInstitute  #BRI  #shop
